Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class ControllerTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ControllerTest
public class ControllerTest extends Object
This tests the controller class

    Method
    Description
    void
    completePlanningPhaseTest()
    This test verifies the correct behavior of the controller when a complete planning phase happens.

    This creates a new GameModel instance to use in every test

    This tests the getCurrentPhase method

    moveMotherNatureAndWinTest()
    This tests that a player can win using mother nature and finishing his towers
    void
    moveMotherNatureTest()
    This test verifies that mother nature is moved in the correct way using the number provided by the user.
    void
    moveNegativeMotherNatureTest()
    This test verifies that the controller doesn't move mother nature when the player chooses a negative number
    void
    moveStudentsTest()
    This test verifies that the move students action of a player works.
    void
    moveStudentsWhenYouCantTest()
    This tests that the move students message is refused when tried to play in a non-ACTION_MOVE_STUDENTS phase
    void
    moveWrongMotherNatureTest()
    This test verifies that the controller doesn't move mother nature when the player chooses a number too high.
    void
    moveWrongStudentsTest()
    This test verifies that the controller sends an error message when a player wants to move creatures that aren't in the entrance.
    void
    playAssistantAlreadyPlayedTest()
    This test verifies that the controller sends an error message to the client because he chose an assistant card already played by another one.
    void
    playAssistantTest()
    This test verifies that the controller can play an assistant card chosen by the current player in the correct way.
    void
    PlayCharacterAndWinTest()
    This tests that when a player with 1 tower left uses Herald character, it will win the game when conquering one island
    void
    playCharacterInMMN()
    This tests the playCharacter method when the game phase is ACTION_MOVE_MOTHER_NATURE
    void
    playCharacterInSelectCloud()
    This tests the playCharacter method when the game phase is ACTION_CLOUD_CHOICE
    void
    playCharacterTest()
    This test verifies that the controller can play a character card in the correct way.
    void
    playCharacterThatDoesntNeedParametersTest()
    This tests the correct behavior of the effect method when a character that doesn't need parameters is played
    void
    playCharacterWithPoorPlayerTest()
    This test verifies that the controller sends an error message when the player wants to play a character card without enough money and that waitingForParameters is still true.
    void
    playCharacterWithWrongParametersTest()
    This tests that when a wrong parameter is provided, the action will not be done
    void
    playLastAssistantTest()
    This tests that when the last assistant for a player is played, the current round is set as the last round of the game
    void
    playMoreThanOneCharacterTest()
    This test verifies that the controller doesn't allow to play more than one character per turn
    void
    playWrongAssistantTest()
    This test verifies that the controller sends an error message and doesn't change the current player when he plays an assistant that doesn't exist.
    void
    playWrongCharacterTest()
    This test verifies that the controller sends an error message when a player wants to play a wrong character card.
    void
    selectAlreadySelectedCloudTest()
    This tests that the selectCloud doesn't work when an already selected cloud is selected by the user
    void
    selectCloudTest()
    This tests that the selectCloud works correctly moving the students from the selected cloud to the currentPlayer's entrance
    void
    selectLastCloudTest()
    This tests that when the last cloud is selected, after the moving of students, the currentPhase is set to PLANNING
    void
    selectWrongCloudTest()
    This tests that the selectCloud doesn't work when a non-existent cloud is selected by the user
    void
    sendCharacterParametersWithoutPlayingCharacter()
    This test verifies that if a player tries to send a characterParametersPayload without having played the character, the controller will not allow the action
    void
    unplayableEffectTest()
    This tests that if wrong provided source creatures are given, the character throws an unplayableEffectException

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerTest

      public ControllerTest()

  • Method Details

    • createGame

      @BeforeEach public void createGame() throws PausedException, IOException
      This creates a new GameModel instance to use in every test
      Throws:
      PausedException
      IOException

    • playAssistantTest

      @Test public void playAssistantTest()
      This test verifies that the controller can play an assistant card chosen by the current player in the correct way. In particular, it verifies that the size of the assistant deck is decreased and that the current player index is changed.

    • playAssistantAlreadyPlayedTest

      @Test public void playAssistantAlreadyPlayedTest()
      This test verifies that the controller sends an error message to the client because he chose an assistant card already played by another one. It verifies also that the current player is the same as before.

    • playWrongAssistantTest

      @Test public void playWrongAssistantTest()
      This test verifies that the controller sends an error message and doesn't change the current player when he plays an assistant that doesn't exist.

    • playLastAssistantTest

      @Test public void playLastAssistantTest()
      This tests that when the last assistant for a player is played, the current round is set as the last round of the game

    • completePlanningPhaseTest

      @Test public void completePlanningPhaseTest()
      This test verifies the correct behavior of the controller when a complete planning phase happens. In particular, he verifies that every player plays an assistant card, game's phase is changed to the following one and that the current player is again the first one.

    • playCharacterTest

      @Test public void playCharacterTest()
      This test verifies that the controller can play a character card in the correct way.

    • playCharacterInMMN

      @Test public void playCharacterInMMN()
      This tests the playCharacter method when the game phase is ACTION_MOVE_MOTHER_NATURE

    • playCharacterInSelectCloud

      @Test public void playCharacterInSelectCloud()
      This tests the playCharacter method when the game phase is ACTION_CLOUD_CHOICE

    • playCharacterWithWrongParametersTest

      @Test public void playCharacterWithWrongParametersTest()
      This tests that when a wrong parameter is provided, the action will not be done

    • PlayCharacterAndWinTest

      @Test public void PlayCharacterAndWinTest() throws GameEndedException
      This tests that when a player with 1 tower left uses Herald character, it will win the game when conquering one island
      Throws:
      GameEndedException

    • playCharacterThatDoesntNeedParametersTest

      @Test public void playCharacterThatDoesntNeedParametersTest()
      This tests the correct behavior of the effect method when a character that doesn't need parameters is played

    • playMoreThanOneCharacterTest

      @Test public void playMoreThanOneCharacterTest()
      This test verifies that the controller doesn't allow to play more than one character per turn

    • sendCharacterParametersWithoutPlayingCharacter

      @Test public void sendCharacterParametersWithoutPlayingCharacter()
      This test verifies that if a player tries to send a characterParametersPayload without having played the character, the controller will not allow the action

    • playWrongCharacterTest

      @Test public void playWrongCharacterTest()
      This test verifies that the controller sends an error message when a player wants to play a wrong character card. In particular, waitingForParameters is still true.

    • playCharacterWithPoorPlayerTest

      @Test public void playCharacterWithPoorPlayerTest()
      This test verifies that the controller sends an error message when the player wants to play a character card without enough money and that waitingForParameters is still true.

    • moveStudentsTest

      @Test public void moveStudentsTest()
      This test verifies that the move students action of a player works. In particular, the students are put in the correct place and game's phase is changed.

    • moveStudentsWhenYouCantTest

      @Test public void moveStudentsWhenYouCantTest()
      This tests that the move students message is refused when tried to play in a non-ACTION_MOVE_STUDENTS phase

    • moveWrongStudentsTest

      @Test public void moveWrongStudentsTest()
      This test verifies that the controller sends an error message when a player wants to move creatures that aren't in the entrance. The controller doesn't increase the number of students moved and the number of students in the entrance is the same as before.

    • moveMotherNatureTest

      @Test public void moveMotherNatureTest()
      This test verifies that mother nature is moved in the correct way using the number provided by the user.

    • moveMotherNatureAndWinTest

      @Test public void moveMotherNatureAndWinTest() throws GameEndedException
      This tests that a player can win using mother nature and finishing his towers
      Throws:
      GameEndedException

    • moveWrongMotherNatureTest

      @Test public void moveWrongMotherNatureTest()
      This test verifies that the controller doesn't move mother nature when the player chooses a number too high.

    • moveNegativeMotherNatureTest

      @Test public void moveNegativeMotherNatureTest()
      This test verifies that the controller doesn't move mother nature when the player chooses a negative number

    • selectCloudTest

      @Test public void selectCloudTest()
      This tests that the selectCloud works correctly moving the students from the selected cloud to the currentPlayer's entrance

    • selectWrongCloudTest

      @Test public void selectWrongCloudTest()
      This tests that the selectCloud doesn't work when a non-existent cloud is selected by the user

    • selectAlreadySelectedCloudTest

      @Test public void selectAlreadySelectedCloudTest()
      This tests that the selectCloud doesn't work when an already selected cloud is selected by the user

    • selectLastCloudTest

      @Test public void selectLastCloudTest()
      This tests that when the last cloud is selected, after the moving of students, the currentPhase is set to PLANNING

    • currentStatusTest

      @Test public void currentStatusTest()
      This tests the getCurrentStatus method

    • currentPhaseTest

      @Test public void currentPhaseTest()
      This tests the getCurrentPhase method

    • unplayableEffectTest

      @Test public void unplayableEffectTest()
      This tests that if wrong provided source creatures are given, the character throws an unplayableEffectException
